title: Color Run, Hubcaps and Holidays
text:
Color Run, Hubcaps and Holidays 0 comments 
What was it? It was a 5K run/walk event. It was held at the Gettysburg Rec Park on Sept. 19, 2015. 
Here are two organizations that participated in the event: the Arc of Adams County and Special Olympics of Adams County.
